snippet: KATZ--Ernest, 98, born in Germany, a Holocaust Survivor, passed away peacefully on May 6, surrounded by his beloved wife Ellen (nee Strauss), two sons Gary and Jeff, their wives, Leslye and Phyllis, grandchildren Dori (Mike), Adam (Nicole), Eric, Michelle and Danny (Lena). He is also leaving behind many devoted family members and friends. Funeral services Monday, May 9, at Temple Shaaray Tefila in Bedford Corners. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KATZ--Ernest, 98, born in Germany, a Holocaust Survivor, passed away peacefully on May 6, surrounded by his beloved wife Ellen (nee Strauss), two sons Gary and Jeff, their wives, Leslye and Phyllis, grandchildren Dori (Mike), Adam (Nicole), Eric, Michelle and Danny (Lena). He is also leaving behind many devoted family members and friends. Funeral services Monday, May 9, at Temple Shaaray Tefila in Bedford Corners. 1/3
